stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ  TEST HEAVY
comments: Tao is a good guy at heart but during his lectures it can be difficult to catch up with him as his talking speed is quick and his accent is heavy. The most difficult part for me was the online homeworks that will take up a lot of your time and only 2 test that you either pass or fail.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  TEST HEAVY  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: I am God awful at Chemistry, so I was really worried that I wouldn\'t pass with him. He is somewhat hard to understand, but not too bad. He only has a midterm and a final for tests, but he does quizzes every class that are open book and can use friends to help you. The homework doesn\'t match anything the test, and it\'s all online, so it was useless.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
stu_tags: CARING  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Accent is not a problem. Quiz\'s everyday, but done w/people around you which helps your grade. Homework once a week that takes hours and is mandatory, and difficult. Very helpful and kind. Helpful in and outside of class, definitely worth taking. Exams are pretty easy, but only two (midterm and final)

comments: Dr.Tao is the bomb! I took him for chem 1411 and 1412 during the summer and the class was not that tough. Why? Because I did the homework, attended class, and studied for tests. Office hours are helpful, and Dr.Tao is always available after class for any clarification. For the people who say Dr.Tao is laughing at them, please understand that he

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: For his Chem 2 class he improved his teaching method by placing the quizzes intermittently through the class period,we were more attentive so everyone did much better. He strongly encourages you refresh your own math, but will certainly help if you stay up with the course work. Go to class, do the homework early, you can do it!

comments: really hard to understand. Must do the homework and quizzes. only 2 tests that are worth more then half your grade so if you fail just one your kinda screwed. he wasn\'t that helpful and when you would ask a question he would most the time just laugh at you. would not suggest to anyone

comments: Understand that this is a SELF TAUGHT COURSE. You have to read the book before class and do the homework early if you want to do really excellent. I hated the quizzes because there was never enough time for me because I am slow and kept trying to learn from the lecture rather than the book. Yes, he is hard to understand, so sit at the front if you

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: If you could understand him you were doing great. When I asked for help, he laughed at me. Daily quizes are done by a remote you buy at the bookstore (if you have the money). HW was online. Basically, you either do really well or fail.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: His English is not the best, but after a while you can understand him better if you go to class and listen. I took Carlisle for Chem 1 and barely squeaked by with a C, so I swapped to Tao and now I have an A

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  Get ready to read (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Hilarious (2)  Inspirational (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  Participation matters (1)  Caring (1)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)
comments: I thoroughly believe that I might have a different opinion of him if he would stop with the daily quizzes, and slow down his lectures. His accent would be difficult enough to decipher at a normal pace, much less the cheetah-like speed at which he talks. Definitely not conducive to learning a difficult subject like chemistry.
